title: Little Fun Club
description:
Sign up to receive a box containing three or two age appropriate, curated children books every month. Our goal is to help you instill the love of reading in your child. The books we send are catered to your child's interests, likes and are assigned with you and your child in mind. We don't just send books,
we curate titles tailored to your child, helping parents raise a reader.
Great for children up to 12 years of age.
